decks.notes: This deck focuses on using Survival of the Fittest to tutor for key creatures and control the game through a combination of removal spells and disruptive creatures. The deck also has a combo element with cards like Rofellos, Llanowar Emissary and Aether Vial to generate extra mana or cheat creatures into play. The main goal is to outvalue the opponent by consistently applying pressure while disrupting their game plan with efficient creatures and removal spells.

The primary goal of this deck is to quickly generate a large amount of mana and cast Goblin Charbelcher to deal lethal damage to the opponent in one turn. The deck includes various ways to generate mana quickly, such as rituals and mana dorks, as well as cards like Burning Wish to search for key combo pieces. The deck aims to win the game before the opponent has a chance to set up their own game plan, focusing on speed and explosive plays.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while setting up its own win condition with powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Gideon Jura. The deck also utilizes card filtering and manipulation with Brainstorm and Sensei's Divining Top to ensure consistency in drawing into key cards. Additionally, Vedalken Shackles and Engineered Explosives provide additional options for dealing with threats on the board. The key strategy is to outlast and outmaneuver opponents through efficient resource management and card advantage.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly swarm the battlefield with powerful Goblin creatures and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive attacks. The use of cards like Goblin Lackey and Aether Vial helps speed up the process of getting Goblins onto the battlefield, while cards like Goblin Matron and Goblin Ringleader provide card advantage and ensure a steady stream of threats. The deck also includes removal options like Pyrokinesis and Warren Weirding to deal with opposing threats. Ultimately, the goal is to capitalize on the tribal synergy of Goblins and maintain pressure on the opponent until victory is achieved.

The deck focuses on using Survival of the Fittest to search for key creatures like Vengevine, Knight of the Reliquary, and Iona, Shield of Emeria to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. It also incorporates control elements with cards like Gaddock Teeg and Swords to Plowshares to handle threats efficiently. The mana base is streamlined to ensure consistency in casting the necessary spells while also providing some utility with cards like Wasteland and Horizon Canopy. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent by efficiently controlling the game and transitioning into a strong late-game with combo potential.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy while utilizing powerful control elements such as removal spells like Swords to Plowshares, disruption like Hymn to Tourach and Thoughtseize, and versatile threats like Tarmogoyf and Knight of the Reliquary. The deck aims to control the game through a combination of hand disruption, removal, and mana denial with cards like Vindicate and Wasteland. The inclusion of Dark Confidant helps maintain card advantage while cards like Mox Diamond and Sensei's Divining Top provide additional utility and support. The deck is designed to outvalue and outlast opponents in longer games.

The main concept of this Belcher combo deck is to quickly generate mana through rituals and mana-producing creatures/cards in order to cast Goblin Charbelcher and activate its ability to deal massive damage to the opponent. The deck relies on fast mana acceleration and efficient card selection to assemble the necessary combo pieces and win the game in a single explosive turn. The inclusion of Burning Wish allows for additional flexibility in accessing sideboard cards to deal with specific matchups or situations.

The deck focuses on using cards like Survival of the Fittest to tutor and cheat out powerful creatures like Iona, Shield of Emeria and Tarmogoyf. It also includes control elements such as Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares to disrupt the opponent's game plan. In addition, the deck has a combo element with Loyal Retainers to reanimate key creatures from the graveyard. The goal is to control the game while setting up powerful creature plays to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

The deck focuses on using artifacts to control the game and lock down opponents' resources. By utilizing cards like Chalice of the Void, Trinisphere, and Tangle Wire, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building towards a powerful board state with creatures like Myr Battlesphere and Platinum Angel. Crucible of Worlds allows for land recursion and synergy with cards like Wasteland and Mishra's Factory. Metalworker and Grim Monolith provide ramp to accelerate the deployment of threats. Overall, the deck aims to establish a prison-like lockdown on the game while building towards overpowering win conditions.

The deck focuses on dealing direct damage to the opponent quickly and efficiently using a combination of aggressive creatures and burn spells. Cards like Grim Lavamancer, Hellspark Elemental, and Spark Elemental provide consistent damage while cards like Fireblast, Lightning Bolt, and Price of Progress offer efficient ways to deal damage. The deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain that pressure throughout the game, ultimately overwhelming them with a barrage of burn spells and aggressive creatures.

This Legacy Goblins deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a swarm of small creatures, taking advantage of tribal synergies to boost their power and speed. The deck utilizes various goblin cards such as Goblin Lackey and Goblin Matron to quickly get creatures onto the battlefield, supported by cards like Goblin Chieftain and Goblin Warchief to pump up their stats. With the help of Aether Vial for additional creature deployment and removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Warren Weirding, the deck aims to maintain board presence and pressure the opponent early on.

This deck focuses on utilizing creature tutor abilities and graveyard recursion to control the board and outvalue the opponent. It aims to control the game with cards like Mother of Runes and Swords to Plowshares while also setting up powerful combos like using Survival of the Fittest to find Vengevine or Loyal Retainers to cheat out Iona, Shield of Emeria. The deck also has access to powerful lands like Gaea's Cradle and Karakas to further enhance its control elements and consistently generate advantage over the opponent.
